text: The best part of my day is your smile.
When we spend the day together, I never want it to end.
Meeting you was the best day of my life.
My heart only beats for you. You have captured my heart, and it is yours forever. Treat it tenderly because it is so filled with my love for you.
I love you!
The most enjoyable captivity in the world is the captivity of your eyes and lips. You are awesome!
Something tells me we were meant to be together forever.
I knew my life’s true meaning as soon as you married me. I love you, my beautiful wife.
My world would be empty with you in it.
When I think of you, I get a smile that is so big, people wonder what I am smiling about.
Only fools believe that love makes a person vulnerable, only love makes a person strong and courageous. Your love made me a better person, because of you I became the man, whom I always wanted to be.
If you could see yourself through my eyes, you would know how much I love you. You hold a very special place in my heart! I will love you forever!
When we are together, the world ceases to exist and the only thing I can see is the two of us sitting side by side, sharing emotions that can't be put into words.
I wouldn’t have nothing if I didn’t have you.
There are two of us and it is wonderful, but unlimited bliss will come when our love blossoms in our children, I love you madly, I live for you!
When I say you are second to none, I mean it. I mean that no one comes before you, you are the light of my heart, and you will always be the best wife for me.
Even though some things don’t need to be spoken, they’re still nice to hear. I love you.
We are partners creating a great life together. Thank you for being by my side.
I knew as soon as I first saw you that my heart was yours forever. How lucky can someone be when the person he loves also loves him back? You are the best wife I could ever ask for.
I got you.
Your cute smile can melt even the icy heart, which I have had before I met you. Thanks for all the happiness that you gave me, I love you.
I plan on being with you until forever ends.
I can’t wait to spend the rest of my life with you.
The kind of love that I have for you won’t fade even if we leave this earth. I believe that it’s so strong that it will transcend the constraints of time in itself.
I’ll take care of you, and you’ll take care of me.
Since no human can live without air, I can’t live without you. I’ll love you until no breath is left in me.
I have never thought that three words would change my life completely. I love you and I am ready to shout about it to everyone!
Don’t ever worry about the future of our relationship: you will be my queen forever and I will be your king if you let me.
I cannot imagine surviving all the hardships of my life without your love and support. Keep holding my hands tightly forever. I love you.
You’re pretty with your make up on but I still love you the same even without it.
I can’t bear to be apart from you, you’re a vital part of me.
I can’t wait to be with you again. Loves and hugs.
The stars must be jealous. You shine way better than they do!
No matter how many years we share together in our marriage, there are two times when I want to be with you – now and forever.
From where I’m standing, our future together looks pretty amazing.
You are beautiful when you wake, beautiful before your hair is brushed, beautiful at work, beautiful when you’re all dressed up, and beautiful on the couch in sweatpants.
Forever is just a word until you realize it perfectly describes how long I want to be with you.
I'm getting butterflies in my stomach just thinking about coming home and seeing you later.
Missing you isn't about how long it has been since I have seen you. It is about the moment when I find myself doing something and wishing you were by my side.
You're beautiful.
I feel like a king because I have you as my queen.
My life is a jigsaw puzzle and you’re my missing piece.

I asked God to send me the best girlfriend in the world, but He sent me a wonderful woman, who has become my true friend, a passionate lover, a caring partner and the one, without whom I cannot live! Thank you for being in my life.
It’s funny how you could go through life not knowing what real love is. But this. This indescribable feeling I’ve never felt before. I guess this is what it’s like to be with a real man.
I get jealous when you bond with other guys, but when you tell me that you love me; I am assured that you will never let me go.
I love who you are.
Relationships are built on memories and every one of our memories are etched in my heart.
I love the way you smile at me when you first see me after a long day at work. You are home to me.
It was hard to get out of bed this morning, because I just want to hold you forever.
There is no doubt that we belong together.
You ended my searching.
I cannot live without you.
Our children are lucky to have you as a mother.
I don’t know how long my life will be, but I know that every second will be worth a lifetime because it will be spent with you.
Love can never be measured. It can only be felt. You have painted my life with the colors of heaven. I don’t want anything else as long as your love is with me!
You will never be alone because I will always be right by your side.
It only took one look at you to know you were going to be my wife. I thank God every day that I listened to my gut. The rest is history. I love you and I love being loved by you.
You look as good today as the first time I saw you and I’m sure you will look even better tomorrow.
I think we could be good together.
I'm proud to be yours.

When I met you for the first time, I thought that you would be my girlfriend, but I could not even imagine that you would change my life so radically, you have become the most important person in my life, I cannot live without you.
I’m happiest when you’re home.
Whenever you can't sleep, just know that the reason is that you are awake in my dreams, and we are sharing a beautiful time together.
I just want you to know, you are so easy to love.
“Some people care too much. I think it’s called love.” ― A.A. Milne
I will keep caring, adoring and loving you forever, during the easy times and the challenges we will face. We are in this together, and you are my partner for life.
They say love is blind, but actually, it has opened my eyes and changed me for the better. Thanks to you, now I know what true love is.
You’re exactly what I hoped for, what I dreamt of, what I needed, and what I still want.
It's you and me....always.
I’m grateful you are thoughtful, I’m grateful you are understanding, I’m grateful you are so much fun to be around, but most of all I’m grateful you are my wife. I love you!
If there will be a book regarding on how to understand a woman, I’m sure it will be thick. And will come in a lot of volumes! But I’ll never have second thoughts of reading those just for you.
As long as you’re my wife, I’ll always be a rich man.
The day I married you was the first day I understood what happiness was.
You are the one that I want to be with forever!
I’d like to wake up next to you every morning!
There aren’t enough words in the entire dictionary to express my feelings for you.
This message only contains few words, but I want you to know that words alone can’t express how much I love you. I love you beyond words.
Look at the computer keyboard, U and I were placed side by side. That’s how the alphabets should be arranged because my love will never cease to exist as long as it’s you and me.
You're the love affair of my life.
This spring will crown all the splendor of our love, and we will become a loving family!
I will love you forever and always.
You complete me.
I want to be your favorite hello, and hardest goodbye.
You have become more than just a friend or just a lover: you are my soulmate, the reason for my happiness and the person with whom I want to share my life. I love you.
Here’s the plan for tonight: *insert bento box emoji, movie emoji, wine emoji, and kissing emoji*
You make our house a home.
Always, said Snape. ― J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
The only time I stupidly smile at my phone is when I get text messages from you.
I love you now, and I’ll love you even more tomorrow.
I love you more than *insert taco emoji*
You fill my heart with countless joy every time you smile. It’s a privilege for anyone to be able to love you! I feel lucky every moment!
“To love is to burn, to be on fire.” - Jane Austen
Since you have entered into my life, there has been chapter before you and will never be any chapter after you. Its only about you and all about you!
If I could give you one thing in life, I'd give you the power to see yourself through my eyes ... only then could you realize how much you mean to me.
I’m so happy to be sharing this life with you.
We simply make sense.
I was living a black and white life until I met you. You brought colors into it and now I’m seeing rainbows everywhere. I love you!
You make my heart soar, my mind race, and my lips form a perfect smile.
My world has no meaning without you.
You always know just what to say to make me feel better.
Neither of us is perfect, but somehow we’re perfect together.
Darling, I hope that this cute message will make you smile: I want you to know that things are changing in the world, but the only thing that will last forever is my love for you.
I am devoted to only you.
No matter how cold it is outside, I know I’ll always be warm in your arms.
Love is an unexplainable feeling. It’s so huge that doesn’t fit in any words, especially these three simple words “I love you”. I want our love to be special and unique. I want it to be eternal.
Do you know what the best girlfriend in the world deserves? She needs a caring, intelligent and affectionate man. My congratulations, you got me!
“To love another person is to see the face of God.” - Victor Hugo
If everything I’ve done has brought me to you, then I don’t regret a thing.
You’re always beautiful to me, even when you don’t feel like you are.
Our love is my greatest possession.
You are mine. I am yours.
When I kiss you, the rest of the world goes away.
There are a million ways to say how much I love you that I truly don’t know where to start.
You are and always be the prettiest girl in the world. At least in my world. Because YOU are my world. And not only that: you are my whole universe!
My greatest fantasies are the ones that start with you and end with you. You are always on my mind. I love you truly madly and deeply!
Love is funny, ot funny haha, but you just can’t stop smiling.
No matter how high, I’ll climb any mountain if I have to, just to have you. I love you!
I have been blessed by the Almighty with such a precious gem like you. I will never let you go. I love you.
I promise you that I will protect you from all the negativity of this world. You only promise to stay with me always. I love you.

Love is my everything. It’s everywhere. It’s in the messages you send me, it’s in the words you say to me and it’s in your eyes when you look at me. Love is in my heart and in my thoughts. Love is you and me.
You’re my best friend.
Don't underestimate the power of a little note or compliment. You're sure to bring a flutter to her heart with these sweet love notes.
You always remain close to my heart, no matter how far you are. I love you babe!
If I could write a song just about us, it would begin softly and slowly, build to a beautiful crescendo, and last forever.
The hardest thing I could ever do is to forget about you.
My heart sealed your place in it right at the moment I met you. This place will always remain constant and intact. I love you so much!
Every day and every night is full of the wonders of your love. I'm thinking about you on this lovely morning and am thankful for being that special man in your life. I love you.
You are the reason for my smile.
The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. - Nicholas Sparks
You’re my definition of perfect.
I don’t need the whole world to love me, just you.
Nice Messages for Your Boyfriend
For you I may be just one person, but for me you are the world.
I go to sleep thinking of you, lose sleep thinking of you, and wake up thinking of you. I will be thinking about you as long as I love you, and the truth is, I will love you forever.
I feel fortunate to have you in my life as you light it up with your glow. I value your presence more than anything else, I love you.
Words aren’t enough to tell you how wonderful you are. I love you.
You check boxes on my wishlist I didn’t even know I wanted.
It is really puzzling how you were able to fit inside my heart.
You are everything to me. Love you.
You make me feel alive every moment. You are the reason behind every joy and every smile of my life. I love you so deeply!
When we’re together it’s as if the world moves in slow motion and we’re the only thing that’s still moving. What can I say boy, your love has me hypnotized.
Your undying and endless love are what sustain me and keep me moving forward when I find myself on the edge of giving up. I love you so much.
If there’s one thing in this world I’m afraid to lose, it’s you. I am so in love with you that I can’t afford to lose you!
Your image is imprinted in my mind, my heart whispers your name and when I close my eyes, I see your face, you are the best part of me, I love you more than it is possible.
When I see you, I wonder what I did to deserve such a wonderful gift in my life. You are a true blessing, and I want you to know that I am thinking about you with love and gratitude.
I’m honored that you’d ever be with me.
If I was a teardrop in your eye I would roll down onto your lips. But if you were a tear in my eye I would never cry as I would be afraid to lose you.
You’re the reason I wake up smiling every day. I will cherish you forever, and I'm so grateful I get to wake up next to you every morning.
I found my princess, would you let me be your prince?
The gleam of your eyes is what I fell for. I will never let tears come to those beautiful eyes. I promise to keep you happy, always.
“You are more powerful than you know; you are beautiful just as you are.” - Melissa Etheridge
The only answer to the questions that arise in my mind like, “Why do I miss you so much that it hurts?” is that I adore you and don't want to spend a minute away from you.
Never believe that you have to flatter me with materialistic things. All I need is your love, because unlike materialistic things your love won’t fade away. It’s forever embedded within my heart.
I love your honesty, your passion, your resilience, your courage, your partnership, and your smile.
Romantic Text Messages for Her
When you turn around, I will always be there.
You are the only girl who ever got my parent’s approval. You must be special!
Your love is like a warm blanket that protects me from the misery and pain that engulfs the world. My knight, my protector, my provider, I love you.
I have heard it said that when you’re in a relationship you can’t see straight, but when I’m with you, everything is picture perfect.
I could never thank you enough for making me a husband and father.
Words aren't enough to tell you how wonderful you are. I love you.
Every time we part, I realize I want s’more. *insert fire and chocolate emojis*
Hey there *insert honey emoji*! I just wanted to say I love you.
“Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.“ - Aristotle
All songs are written about love, that praise this wonderful feeling, pale in comparison with the history of our love. I love you madly!
It’s impossible not to love you.
I admire you, I care for you, I love you, I respect you and I trust you. Unconditionally.
I know there is a Heaven, as God sent me you.
We have such a beautiful, magical, exciting life together, and I wouldn’t change anything for the world. We have proven to each other that we are truly soulmates. I love you with all my heart.
It is said that only together with a real man a woman can bloom and enjoy life, I feel like the most beautiful flower on the planet because I am with you! Thank you for your love.
Making memories with you is my favorite thing to do.
When I’m with you, all I do is pray to God that he stops the time from flowing. All I want in life is to spend a forever with you. I love you dear!
The best feeling on Earth – it is to be your girlfriend and to bloom from your love. You are the love of my life.
My dazzling princess, may I dance with you to the tune of the music that lasts forever?
On the first day I met you, I had a special feeling about us. It was a feeling of peace and happiness believing that my dreams were about to come true.
You feed my heart and my soul with your love. I love you more than anything in this world!
Me + You = A forever kind of love
Let’s build a complete life together.
Even after all these years of being married, our relationship continues to grow and thrive, and we still have so much fun together. You are the light of my life.
We were meant for each other.
Every moment you’re away, my heart aches more.
I love you and it’s getting worse.
Cute Messages for Your Girlfriend
I can’t live without you.
Marrying you was a fairy tale that came true for me. I’m still living in a fantasy and all credit to that goes to you. I love you!

If you were cheese, I would be a mouse so I can nibble you bit by bit. If you were milk, I would be a cat so I can drink you sip by sip. But if you were a mouse, I would still be a cat so I can devour you piece by piece. I love you.
I like-like you.
Each time I make a wish, I wish for us to be together forever. I know it will come true because you already live in my heart. I love you.
You are beautiful, sexy, and cute, all at the same time.
When I search for words to tell how I feel about my true love, it is hard because there just aren’t enough.
My life was empty and my heart grew cold. Then you came into my life, made my heart warm with your love and my life filled with happiness. I love for that!
Love is like the deep blue sky with its shadow embracing the oceans beneath. Our love is just like the horizon that meets each other and remains wrapped day in and out!
I will love you forever if you let me.
Seeing your face is the fastest way to put a smile on mine.
The phrase sweetheart has always been one of my favorites and no one has a heart as sweet as yours.
Your sparkling eyes, beautiful smile, sweet lips, and your entire being just hypnotize me with feelings I adore.
P.S. I love you!
You’re my first thought when I wake up, and my last thought before I fall asleep.
Just so you know, I’m madly in love with you.
Love Messages for Her
I just want you to put your hand on my face and tell me you love me.
I don’t know where I end and you begin because I have loved you for so long. The best days of my life have been spent with you next to me. You are the biggest blessing of my life.
You’re the best thing that’s ever been mine.
I'm having one of those days that make me realize how lost I'd be without you.
Whenever you are having a tough time, just think of me and know that I am thinking of you at that exact moment. Even when we're apart, I am here for you.
I can’t imagine living a life without you. You are my reason to be.
You're my missing puzzle piece. You complete me.
You are IN my mind every second of the day. But if you want, you can be IN my house right now.
You’re the most selfless individual I’ve ever met.
You bring smiles to my face and joy to my heart. You make me so happy that you’re the only thing I think of all day long. I love you honey.
If you see a shooting star, close your eyes and make a wish. It worked for me, I wished for you!
At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet. - Plato

You revised my world when you entered my life. The change is obvious to everyone who knows me. You added color, meaning, and intense joy to my world. There are no words to describe how much you mean to me.
Together, we are amazing.
Every love story is beautiful but ours is my favorite.
The smallest work I know is ‘I’, the sweetest word I know is ‘love’, and the only thing that will remind me of that will be ‘you’.
The only real thing in this world is our love, it made me feel alive. I love you, baby.
If words are not enough to say that I love you, I will shower you with my hugs and kisses.
I’m all yours if you’re all mine.
Some compare being in a relationship to being under a spell. If that is true, I’ll stay under your spell anytime.
Even if the oceans dried up and the days turn into nights and even if the stars starts falling from the sky, as long as you are by my side, my world will be perfect.
Your childish giggles melt my heart every time I hear them. Keep laughing like this always. I love you.
The best thing about me is you.
Because maybe, you're gonna be the one that saves me, after all, you're my wonder-wall
Thank you for saying yes.
When I am in your presence, my heart is full and I feel stronger, wiser, and more confident. You inspire me to reach deep into my heart and love you with all of the passion I have.
You clearly have a piece of my heart and it is a big one.
“The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.” - Mitch Albom
“How do you spell 'love'?" - Piglet
I love who you are, I love who you were, I love who you are becoming.
The beauty in your eyes and the innocence in your face drives me crazy all the time. I want you in my life for today, tomorrow and forever.
Your hand fits in mine, like it's made just for me.
You are my warmth when I feel cold.
Whenever I am thinking about you, I feel complete. That is enough for me for now, but I long to be in your arms again soon.
Nothing is as beautiful or as sweet as the love we share.
You’re my first thought every morning and my last thought before I go to sleep.
“So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.” - Paulo Coehlo
You make me excited in ways that no one else can.
If you stumbled and fell down, take my hand. I’ll be your feet, so you could go on. I love you!
Your smile takes my breath away. It took my breath away on the day we met, on our wedding day, today, and every day in between.
“I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more” ― Angelita Lim
Just thinking about you for a few moments can turn any bad day into a good one.
You’re my Prince Charming, and this is our ‘happily ever after.”
Each day I spend with you is another day that I can be grateful for. You are life’s gift to me that I get to unwrap every day.
When you’re on my arm, I feel like the luckiest guy in the world.
All of me loves all of you.
Kissing you is my favorite thing to do.
Every day I discover more things I love about you.
My life wouldn’t have been this wonderful with you. I wouldn’t have been this enjoyable without your love. I’m in heaven, having you as my lover.
I see myself in your eyes and feel your presence deep in my heart. Please remain there, my cherished wife, because you are the only one who fits there perfectly.
To have you as my girl is my honor. Be with me always!
“Love is a promise, love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear.” - John Lennon
There is an ocean in your eyes, and I can see myself inside of it. It's impossible to measure the depths of the love that I feel for you.
Because you are in my life, everything seems perfect and nothing is out of balance. I love you for making my life a piece of heaven.
I never ever thought I’d like you this much and I never planned to have you on my mind this often.
I can't describe my feelings for you. I love you, but how can I prove my heart's feelings? My feelings will never diminish and will keep growing stronger every day.
Romantic Text Messages
When I look at you, I realize that beauty truly will save the world! At least your outer and inner beauty saved my heart!
You're the beat of my heart.
You stop being so hot, attractive and good-hearted, then I’ll decrease a little bit of loving too!
Yours is the only opinion that matters to me.
Our puppy and I have big plans to give you a million kisses tonight.
At night I dream of you and imagine that you're right there beside me.
Life isn’t always easy, but it’s a lot easier with you by my side.
Someday I might write a poem to describe your beauty, or a song to express my affection for you. But right now, I’m just lost in your love!
No on the planet could ever compare to your beauty, kindness and overall wonder.
Thinking of you empowers me to be a better person, which is why I keep you in my mind all day.
I love being pampered by you, and especially when you play with my hair I go crazier for you even more. Stay with me always, I love you.
Thank you for lifting me up when I’m at my best and my worst. I promise to always return the favor.
You make my life immeasurably better.
Your smile is my sunrise and your kiss is my sunset. Thank you for being the most wonderful friend and companion and making my day beautiful, every day!
I want a repeat of last night.
“Love me when I least deserve it, because that’s when I really need it.” - Swedish Proverb
I knew my love for you was real when I realized I care more about you than I do myself.
I know the meaning of true love because you showed it to me. You have been with me through everything, and you have shown me nothing but unconditional love. Thank you, my love.
I love you from my head to my toes.
The best thing about being in love with you is that I have begun to enjoy every season of life with a lot more zest than I usually do. Such is the magic of your love, sweetheart.
I can go at any stretch to defend my love for you. I have only one desire in my heart and that is having you as my lover. I love you!
I love you like XO.
You are my one of a kind!
I could not have asked for a more caring, thoughtful husband.
Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same. - Emily Bronte
I am so proud of the woman that you are and the woman you're becoming. You inspire me to be a better man.
I can feel you when you’re next to me and it feels good.
You can make even my worst days better.
My favorite place is by your side.
Meeting you was the best thing that has ever happened to me. I feel lucky to have you. I love you, Babe.
The only thing that could make me love you more is a ring!
Thank you for loving me and my flaws.
You’re the *insert light bulb emoji* of my life.
The summer wind speaks your name to me while the winter wind makes me want to keep you warm.
I'm thinking of you right now.
I am the husband that I am only because of your love and care. You have demonstrated the true meaning of love. You have shown me how to be loved. I live for your love.
You are like those songs that I can’t keep out of my mind. And it is not because you are in my head, but also in my heart.
Tell me how you’ll kiss me when I see you tonight.
I am very willing to be the diary of your life. Just tell me everything, even the bad things about you. Don’t worry, nothing will change.
I’m lucky to call you my girlfriend.
The wind whispers your name, stars illuminate my way to you, we will meet soon, love you!
You were the one who inspired me to be a better man, just by loving me. I want to make you proud and inspire you to be the woman you want to be. I love you, my dearest wife!

I will forever cherish the day that I became yours and you became mine. It was on this day that my life changed forever, the day that my best dream came true. I love you and I will never stop showing you how much I care.
You have made me realized that love is the best feeling any human can feel. Thank you for coming in my life. I love you.
I’m much more me when I’m with you.
I am thinking about you and miss you already. Your eyes melt me when I look into them, and I can't let go of that happy feeling when we are together. Hurry back to me!
It is impossible to measure, describe, count and portray my love, just feel it, I love you.
I’m in love with my best friend.
No fear can touch me except the fear of losing you. I have never loved anyone this much before. My only hope in life is you. I love you!

Every time I look at you, I notice your beauty that is out of this world. You shine brighter than the sun, and you sparkle like the night stars. When I stand in front of you, I become breathless. I love you so much.
Our friendship was the best preamble for our love story. I’ll never forget the day I met you, and I will always remember the day I loved you.
I’d like to be the air you breathe and the Sun that heats you, but the most I want is to be the love of your life.
I didn’t know what marrying your best friend meant until I met you.
One text from you changes my whole mood.
I love you more than I did yesterday but not more than I will tomorrow.
If you are a prize, I’ll do anything to take you home. If you are Medal, I’ll work hard to earn you. If you are a flower, I’ll be watering you to grow beautifully.
Thanks for being my greatest inspiration.
You are a great blessing, and what’s better is, you are my blessing.
“If you live to be 100, I want to live to be 100 minus one day so I never have to live without you." - A. A. Milne
For the sake of your love, I will get a star from the sky and go on any deed, I will be ready to do it! I love you.
The impact of your love is undeniable. It has made me realize how much I adore you. My life with you has transformed my dreams into realities.
Life would be such a dark place without you. I love you with all my heart and I want to thank you for every amazing memory you gave me.
I love you every second, every minute, every hour, and every day.
Years ago I gave you my heart and I can’t believe you took it.
Every time I look at you, I see something new and beautiful.
Our kiss still lingers on my lips. I can't wait to taste you again.
My world was so empty and dark that it all seemed so meaningless to me. But when I met you, suddenly it felt like the sky over me has lightened up by thousand stars. I love you!
Our life together is a dream come true. Life has been good to us, and I am confident that we will overcome anything we must face. I know that our love will see us through.
You drive me crazy!
I would choose a moment on Earth with you than an eternity in paradise without you. I love you.
Even when we are not together, I always feel your love's presence in my life. Everything you do makes me love you more.
